pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, August 18, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a ceremony.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pool coverage
  • Pool media must arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

House of Commons Foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
